items.sentence: Tom pretended to be drunker than he really was.
You're the one who bumped into Tom, aren't you?
Go get the keys. We have to get this door open.
When are you going to open your new restaurant?
Tom told me Mary has always done that that way.
Tom told me I'm better at doing that than Mary.
Tom told me I needed to attend today's meeting.
Tom told me he's not certain what he should do.
Tom wants to be a doctor, just like his father.
Tom told me you're the person I should talk to.
